        Description: register boolean allows to register both regular and premium users.

        name - String is the user name.

      • registerBibliographicProduct

        public boolean registerBibliographicProduct(int productType,
                                            java.lang.String id,
                                            java.lang.String name,
                                            int pages,
                                            java.lang.String review,
                                            int day,
                                            int month,
                                            int year,
                                            int selection,
                                            java.lang.String url,
                                            double price,
                                            int periodicity)
        Description: registerBibliographicalProduct boolean allows to register both book and magazine products.
        Parameters:
        productType - int is the selection of the product type.
        id - String is the product hex identification code.
        name - String is the product name.
        pages - int is the number of pages.
        review - String is the book review.
        day - int is the day of the publication date.
        month - int is the month of the publication date.
        year - int is the year of the publication date.
        selection - int is the selection of both book genre or magazine category.
        url - String is the front page URL.
        price - double is the sell or subcription price.
        periodicity - int is the mamgazine periodicity.
        Returns:
        true if the product is registered, false if it is not.
